help.title: Here are all my commands:
help.desc: If you notice a problem please contact
help.bookChance: Get the % chance you have of getting at least 1 Book of Dark Rituals.
help.clear: Deletes all the messages the bot has sent you.
help.findLogs: Makes the bot search the database for your item.
help.lockbox: Gives information about a lockbox or tells you what box drops your item.
help.rate: Tells you the crowns per energy rate currently in use.
help.unbox: Simulate opening a box and be disappointed for free.
